scripts.build:css: stylus stylus/main.styl -o static/css/main.css && cat static/css/auto-complete.css static/css/bootstrap.min.css static/css/flatpickr.min.css static/css/magicsuggest.css static/css/pikaday.css static/css/typeahead.css static/css/main.css > /tmp/bundle && mv /tmp/bundle static/css/main.css && gzip -c static/css/main.css > dist/css/main.css.gz
scripts.build:js: scripts/writeLoadViews.js && browserify client/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] | uglifyjs > static/js/bundle.js && gzip -c static/js/bundle.js > static/js/bundle.js.gz
scripts.build:js-debug: scripts/writeLoadViews.js && browserify client/js/main.js -o static/js/debug.js -x moment -x jquery -x backbone -x underscore -x pikaday -x intl -d -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] --ignore [ /node_modules/, /vendor/ ] ] && gzip -c static/js/debug.js > dist/js/debug.js.gz
scripts.build:vendor: browserify -r moment -r jquery -r backbone -r underscore -r pikaday -r intl > static/js/vendor.js && gzip -c static/js/vendor.js > static/js/vendor.js.gz
scripts.build:watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run livereload
